document.heading: Public Space Enforcement Amendment Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-207, the “Public Space Enforcement Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-905. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Oct. 28, 2014, and Nov. 18, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Dec. 8, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-503 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-207 became effective on Mar. 11, 2015.
